Explanation: The bug in the buggy code is that it only counts the first pair of same adjacent numbers and if the first five numbers are the same, it returns 1 regardless of the rest of the array. Generated Test cases 1-8 should pass the buggy code as they either have no clumps, one clump or the first five numbers are the same. Test cases 9-11 should fail the buggy code as they have more than one clump and the first five numbers are not the same.
